{{cpp/experimental/reflect/title|Alias}}
{{cpp/experimental/reflect/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=reflection_ts | header=experimental/reflect | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept Alias = Named&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; ScopedMember&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; /* 见下文 */;
}}

{{tt|Alias}} [[cpp/language/constraints|概念]]当且仅当 T 反射 [[cpp/language/typedef|{{tt|typedef}} 声明]]、[[cpp/language/type_alias|别名声明]]、[[cpp/language/namespace_alias|命名空间别名]]、[[cpp/language/template_parameters|模板类型形参]]、[[cpp/language/decltype|decltype-说明符]] 或由 [[cpp/language/using_declaration|using-声明]]所引入的声明时得以满足（注意：{{tt|Alias}} 的 {{tt|Scope}} 是该别名所注入的作用域）。
